page.title: 18Employment
page.content: Some of the group wanted to make a survey of the types of employment which their parents were engaged in. There are 49 families who have children at the Primary School and between them they have 27 different jobs. Farming is the most common form of employment; nearly 25% are engaged in farming. Of the remainder, many commute to towns and cities within a 50 km radius. The Irish Sea Gas Fields, the Nuclear Power Station at Heysham and Lancaster University are significant employers. The jobs in which the parents are involved in were allocated to one of six socio-economic groups as follows:- Professional 47% Agricultural 22% Managerial 16% Sk. Manual 12% Semi Sk. Unskilled Manual 3% Manual 0% Unemployment is not a great problem in this area for which we are grateful.
